title: They Call Him OG
overview: After vanishing from Mumbai's underworld for a decade, mob boss Ojas Gambheera resurfacesâ€”feared, unstoppable, and with a single goal: to reclaim his empire and exact vengeance on the current tyrant, Omi Bhau. As loyalties fracture and alliances shift, OG reignites a brutal criminal war, confronting both external threats and haunting buried betrayals.
